title: Logging in to the agent interface
content:
At the login page, enter your username and password to log in to the agent interface. The URL of the login page includes a TENANTID. 

Note  

  • Make sure that cookies are enabled on your machine before you log in.
  • You must enter a username that belongs to the tenant designated in the URL. If you enter a username that doesn't belong to the specified tenant, an error is generated and you can't log in.

When working in the agent interface, you can click the arrow in the upper right and select About to open a dialog box, which displays the following details:

  • The suite version you are running
  • The TENANTID
  • The tenant type (Production, DEV, or Trial)

You can also view the TENANTID and tenant type at the bottom of the main menu.
